DOC.detailed_description: Delayed gastric empty ( DGE ) common complication pancreaticoduodenectomy ( PD ) , occur 20 % 70 % patient . In recent study Sakamoto et al , proximal Roux-en-y gastrojejunal anastomosis associate reduced incidence DGE pylorus-resecting pancreaticoduodenectomy ( PrPD ) ; however , result may bias retrospective nature . Therefore , investigator conduct present randomize control trial ( RCT ) evaluate impact proximal Roux-en-y gastrojejunal anastomosis reduce DGE follow PrPD .
